form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Heinrich (for himself and Mr. Udall) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To increase the maximum percentage of funds available to the Department of Energy for laboratory directed research and development.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the LDRD Enhancement Act of 2015.

section.header: Increase in cap on funding for laboratory directed research and development

subsection.text: Section 308 of the Energy and Water Development and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2009 (division C of Public Law 111–8; 123 Stat. 626) is amended by striking 8 percent and inserting 10 percent.
Section 4811(c) of the Atomic Energy Defense Act (50 U.S.C. 2791(c)) is amended by striking 6 percent and inserting 10 percent.
Section 309 of the Energy and Water Development and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2014 (division D of Public Law 113–76; 128 Stat. 175) is repealed.
